entry.title: abhishek-shigavan/job-application-tracker: A mini Job‑Application Tracker (similar to a lightweight Trello board) where an authenticated user can add job opportunities and move each card through pipeline stages (Applied → Interview → Offer → Hired / Rejected) in real time.
entry.content: A mini Job‑Application Tracker (similar to a lightweight Trello board) where an authenticated user can add job opportunities and move each card through pipeline stages (Applied → Interview → Offer → Hired / Rejected) in real time.

entry.title: thinakaranmanokaran/Package-Helper: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.

entry.title: anakafeel/hyprland-dotfiles: This repository contains my personal dotfiles and configuration files for customizing my Hyprland setup, a dynamic and lightweight Wayland compositor. The configurations are designed for a clean, modular, and aesthetic workflow, leveraging tools like GNU Stow for easy management and portability of dotfiles.
entry.content: This repository contains my personal dotfiles and configuration files for customizing my Hyprland setup, a dynamic and lightweight Wayland compositor. The configurations are designed for a clean, modular, and aesthetic workflow, leveraging tools like GNU Stow for easy management and portability of dotfiles.

entry.title: khyatish14/bottom-sheet-stepper: A lightweight and customizable stepper component for React Native, built on top of @gorhom/bottom-sheet. Easily manage multi-step flows in a modal bottom sheet with smooth animations and full control.

entry.title: hany226/vibe-coding-starter-pack-3d-multiplayer: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.

entry.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. entry.content: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
